== Introduction ==

 This page is a home to the Ubuntu Emirates LoCo Team; it helps to give insight and distribute information regarding all Ubuntu related issues locally.  We are here to show how this distribution of Linux is a key player in the IT market for both personal and professional use.  Everyone involved in the LoCo has equal opportunity towards the development of GNU/Linux in United Arab Emirates.  You are an ambassador to help and assist in the migration towards Open Source technologies.

 Our goal as a team is to market the abilities of Ubuntu as a powerful Operating System and help people integrate the technology and/or migrating from other Operating Systems and technologies into this one as a more advanced and beneficial advantage. We conduct frequent training on how to use Linux, showcasing its ease of use.  We also organize installation festivals whenever possible.

== How to join ==

1. Create a Launchpad account.(If you didn't already have one!). <nowiki>[[https://join.launchpad.net|Do it Now!]]</nowiki>
2. Join our Launchpad team. <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~emirateslocoteam/+join|Do it Now!]]</nowiki>
3. Subscribe to the Mailing list to stay in touch with us. <nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/EmiratesLoCo/messages/archive/|Do it Now!]]</nowiki>

== How to Contribute ==

 {*} Join our mailing list.

 {*} Try to attend meetings which will be conducted either over IRC or physically in person at agreed local locations. (Follow the mailing list for information).

 {*} Spread the word of Ubuntu in your society.

 {*} Bringing more members into our team.

 {*} Write articles in our wiki or in our up comping web portal.

 {*} Share success stories of Ubuntu experience.

 {*} Participate in our events.

 {*} Introduce any ideas and methods of implementation.

== Projects ==

 Our tasks currently include introducing GNU/Linux, specifically Ubuntu to as many people as possible in the United Arab Emirates community.  We will achieve this by distributing large amounts of Ubuntu master CDs.  This will cost money due to Emirates taxes, but will help market Ubuntu here since has very few original CD's in the market.

== Goals for year 2012 ==

 {*} Help the team grow in technical ability and size.

 {*} Become an Approved LoCo team.

 {*} Organize an installation fest.

 {*} Start Linux training on a professional level.
